body.div:
Miles Sandlar
November 12th, 2012
Nicole Kreiser
PSYC-3014
Dissociative Identity Disorder in Fight Club

div.p: Fight Club is a movie which portrays a individual who remains nameless who experiences symptoms of dissociative identity disorder. The movie introduces the narrator as an insomniac with a job at an automobile company. The narrarator is drowning in consumerism, suffers from relentless insomnia, and find relief by attending a support group for testicular cancer. Norton meets a man by the name of Tyler Durden on a flight. After Norton's apartment explodes as a result of a burner he accidently left on, Norton calls Tyler and befriends
